queries.description: hint table without partitioning should throw exception
queries.sql: EXPLAIN PLAN FOR SELECT * FROM d /*+ tableOptions(partition_key='col1', partition_size='4') */ LIMIT 10

queries.description: hint table with partition on wrong key should throw exception
queries.sql: EXPLAIN PLAN FOR SELECT * FROM a /*+ tableOptions(partition_key='col1', partition_size='4') */ LIMIT 10

queries.description: hint table with partition on wrong size should throw exception
queries.sql: EXPLAIN PLAN FOR SELECT * FROM a /*+ tableOptions(partition_key='col2', partition_size='2') */ LIMIT 10

queries.description: hint table with partition on wrong function should throw exception
queries.sql: EXPLAIN PLAN FOR SELECT * FROM a /*+ tableOptions(partition_key='col2', partition_size='4', partition_function='murmur') */ LIMIT 10

queries.description: Inner join with group by
queries.sql: EXPLAIN PLAN FOR SELECT /*+ aggOptions(is_partitioned_by_group_by_keys='true') */ a.col1, AVG(b.col3) FROM a JOIN b ON a.col1 = b.col2  WHERE a.col3 >= 0 AND a.col2 = 'a' AND b.col3 < 0 GROUP BY a.col1

queries.description: semi-join with dynamic_broadcast join strategy
queries.sql: EXPLAIN PLAN FOR SELECT a.col1, a.col2 FROM a WHERE a.col1 IN (SELECT col2 FROM b WHERE b.col3 > 0)

queries.description: semi-join with multi-ple dynamic_broadcast join strategy then group-by on same key
queries.sql: EXPLAIN PLAN FOR SELECT a.col1, a.col2 FROM a WHERE a.col1 IN (SELECT col2 FROM b WHERE b.col3 > 0) AND a.col2 IN (select col1 FROM c WHERE c.col3 > 0)

queries.description: semi-join with multi-ple dynamic_broadcast join strategy then group-by
queries.sql: EXPLAIN PLAN FOR SELECT a.col1, SUM(a.col3) FROM a WHERE a.col1 IN (SELECT col2 FROM b WHERE b.col3 > 0) AND a.col2 IN (select col1 FROM c WHERE c.col3 > 0) GROUP BY 1

queries.description: semi-join with dynamic_broadcast join strategy then group-by on same key
queries.sql: EXPLAIN PLAN FOR SELECT /*+ aggOptionsInternal(agg_type='DIRECT') */ a.col1, SUM(a.col3) FROM a WHERE a.col1 IN (SELECT col2 FROM b WHERE b.col3 > 0) GROUP BY 1

queries.description: semi-join with dynamic_broadcast join strategy then group-by on different key
queries.sql: EXPLAIN PLAN FOR SELECT a.col2, SUM(a.col3) FROM a WHERE a.col1 IN (SELECT col2 FROM b WHERE b.col3 > 0) GROUP BY 1

queries.description: aggregate with skip leaf stage hint, group by aggregate
queries.sql: EXPLAIN PLAN FOR SELECT /*+ aggOptions(is_skip_leaf_stage_group_by='true') */ a.col2, a.col1, SUM(a.col3) FROM a WHERE a.col3 >= 0 AND a.col1 = 'a' GROUP BY a.col1, a.col2

queries.description: aggregate with skip leaf stage hint, group by aggregate with having clause
queries.sql: EXPLAIN PLAN FOR SELECT /*+ aggOptions(is_skip_leaf_stage_group_by='true') */ a.col2, COUNT(*), SUM(a.col3), SUM(a.col1) FROM a WHERE a.col3 >= 0 AND a.col2 = 'a' GROUP BY a.col2 HAVING COUNT(*) > 10 AND MAX(a.col3) >= 0 AND MIN(a.col3) < 20 AND SUM(a.col3) <= 10 AND AVG(a.col3) = 5
output: LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$1=[COUNT()], EXPR$2=[$SUM0($1)], EXPR$3=[$SUM0($2)], agg#3=[MAX($1)], agg#4=[MIN($1)])

queries.description: aggregate with skip intermediate stage hint (via hinting the leaf stage group by as final stage_
queries.sql: EXPLAIN PLAN FOR SELECT /*+ aggOptionsInternal(agg_type='DIRECT') */ a.col2, COUNT(*), SUM(a.col3), SUM(a.col1) FROM a WHERE a.col3 >= 0 AND a.col2 = 'a' GROUP BY a.col2 HAVING COUNT(*) > 10

queries.description: aggregate with skip leaf stage hint (via hint option is_partitioned_by_group_by_keys
queries.sql: EXPLAIN PLAN FOR SELECT /*+ aggOptions(is_partitioned_by_group_by_keys='true') */ a.col2, COUNT(*), SUM(a.col3), SUM(a.col1) FROM a WHERE a.col3 >= 0 AND a.col2 = 'a' GROUP BY a.col2

queries.description: join with colocated tables
queries.sql: EXPLAIN PLAN FOR SELECT a.col2, a.col3, b.col3 FROM a /*+ tableOptions(partition_key='col2', partition_size='4') */ JOIN b /*+ tableOptions(partition_key='col1', partition_size='4') */ ON a.col2 = b.col1 WHERE b.col3 > 0

queries.description: group by with pre-partitioned tables on partition column
queries.sql: EXPLAIN PLAN FOR SELECT a.col2, SUM(a.col3) FROM a /*+ tableOptions(partition_key='col2', partition_size='4') */ GROUP BY 1

queries.description: group by with pre-partitioned tables on non-partition column
queries.sql: EXPLAIN PLAN FOR SELECT a.col1, SUM(a.col3) FROM a /*+ tableOptions(partition_key='col2', partition_size='4') */ GROUP BY 1

queries.description: join with colocated tables then group-by left join key column
queries.sql: EXPLAIN PLAN FOR SELECT a.col2, SUM(a.col3) FROM a /*+ tableOptions(partition_key='col2', partition_size='4') */ JOIN b /*+ tableOptions(partition_key='col1', partition_size='4') */ ON a.col2 = b.col1 WHERE b.col3 > 0 GROUP BY 1

queries.description: join with colocated tables then group-by left join key column and other columns
queries.sql: EXPLAIN PLAN FOR SELECT a.col2, b.col2, SUM(a.col3) FROM a /*+ tableOptions(partition_key='col2', partition_size='4') */ JOIN b /*+ tableOptions(partition_key='col1', partition_size='4') */ ON a.col2 = b.col1 WHERE b.col3 > 0 GROUP BY 1, 2

queries.description: join with colocated tables then group-by other columns
queries.sql: EXPLAIN PLAN FOR SELECT b.col2, SUM(a.col3) FROM a /*+ tableOptions(partition_key='col2', partition_size='4') */ JOIN b /*+ tableOptions(partition_key='col1', partition_size='4') */ ON a.col2 = b.col1 WHERE b.col3 > 0 GROUP BY 1

queries.description: agg + semi-join on colocated tables then group by on partition column
queries.sql: EXPLAIN PLAN FOR SELECT a.col2, SUM(a.col3) FROM a /*+ tableOptions(partition_key='col2', partition_size='4') */ WHERE a.col2 IN (SELECT col1 FROM b /*+ tableOptions(partition_key='col1', partition_size='4') */ WHERE b.col3 > 0) GROUP BY 1

queries.description: agg + semi-join on pre-partitioned main tables then group by on partition column
queries.sql: EXPLAIN PLAN FOR SELECT a.col2, SUM(a.col3) FROM a /*+ tableOptions(partition_key='col2', partition_size='4') */ WHERE a.col2 IN (SELECT col1 FROM b WHERE b.col3 > 0) GROUP BY 1

queries.description: agg + semi-join on pre-partitioned main tables then group by on non-partitioned column
queries.sql: EXPLAIN PLAN FOR SELECT a.col1, SUM(a.col3) FROM a /*+ tableOptions(partition_key='col2', partition_size='4') */ WHERE a.col2 IN (SELECT col1 FROM b WHERE b.col3 > 0) GROUP BY 1

queries.description: agg + semi-join on pre-partitioned main tables with group by on partitioned column on semi table
queries.sql: EXPLAIN PLAN FOR SELECT a.col1, SUM(a.col3) FROM a /*+ tableOptions(partition_key='col2', partition_size='4') */ WHERE a.col2 IN (SELECT col1 FROM b /*+ tableOptions(partition_key='col1', partition_size='4') */ WHERE b.col3 > 0 GROUP BY 1 HAVING COUNT(*) > 1) GROUP BY 1

queries.description: agg + semi-join on pre-partitioned main tables with group by on partitioned column with having filter on top of semi join
queries.sql: EXPLAIN PLAN FOR SELECT a.col1, SUM(a.col3) FROM a /*+ tableOptions(partition_key='col2', partition_size='4') */ WHERE a.col2 IN (SELECT col1 FROM b /*+ tableOptions(partition_key='col1', partition_size='4') */ WHERE b.col3 > 0) GROUP BY 1 HAVING COUNT(*) > 5

queries.description: agg + semi-join on pre-partitioned main tables with group by on partitioned column with sorting on top of semi join
queries.sql: EXPLAIN PLAN FOR SELECT a.col1, SUM(a.col3) FROM a /*+ tableOptions(partition_key='col2', partition_size='4') */ WHERE a.col2 IN (SELECT col1 FROM b /*+ tableOptions(partition_key='col1', partition_size='4') */ WHERE b.col3 > 0) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 2 DESC

queries.description: co-partition agg + semi-join with colocated tables & agg hint
queries.sql: EXPLAIN PLAN FOR SELECT /*+ aggOptions(is_partitioned_by_group_by_keys='true') */ a.col2, SUM(a.col3) FROM a /*+ tableOptions(partition_key='col2', partition_size='4') */ WHERE a.col2 IN (SELECT col1 FROM b /*+ tableOptions(partition_key='col1', partition_size='4') */ WHERE b.col3 > 0) GROUP BY 1

queries.description: co-partition agg + semi-join with single table partition & agg hint
queries.sql: EXPLAIN PLAN FOR SELECT /*+ aggOptions(is_partitioned_by_group_by_keys='true') */ a.col2, SUM(a.col3) FROM a /*+ tableOptions(partition_key='col2', partition_size='4') */ WHERE a.col2 IN (SELECT col1 FROM b WHERE b.col3 > 0) GROUP BY 1

queries.description: co-partition agg + semi-join on pre-partitioned main tables with group by on partitioned column with having filter on top of semi join
queries.sql: EXPLAIN PLAN FOR SELECT /*+ aggOptions(is_partitioned_by_group_by_keys='true') */ a.col2, SUM(a.col3) FROM a /*+ tableOptions(partition_key='col2', partition_size='4') */ WHERE a.col2 IN (SELECT col1 FROM b /*+ tableOptions(partition_key='col1', partition_size='4') */ WHERE b.col3 > 0) GROUP BY 1 HAVING COUNT(*) > 5

queries.description: co-partition agg + semi-join on pre-partitioned main tables with group by on partitioned column with sorting on top of semi join colocated on partition key
queries.sql: EXPLAIN PLAN FOR SELECT /*+ aggOptions(is_partitioned_by_group_by_keys='true') */ a.col2, SUM(a.col3) FROM a /*+ tableOptions(partition_key='col2', partition_size='4') */ WHERE a.col2 IN (SELECT col1 FROM b /*+ tableOptions(partition_key='col1', partition_size='4') */ WHERE b.col3 > 0) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 2 DESC

queries.description: semi-join on pre-partitioned main tables with sorting on top of semi join on join key
queries.sql: EXPLAIN PLAN FOR SELECT a.col2 FROM a /*+ tableOptions(partition_key='col2', partition_size='4') */ WHERE a.col2 IN (SELECT col1 FROM b /*+ tableOptions(partition_key='col1', partition_size='4') */ WHERE b.col3 > 0) ORDER BY 1 DESC

queries.description: semi-join on pre-partitioned main tables with sorting on top of semi join with non-join columns
queries.sql: EXPLAIN PLAN FOR SELECT a.col1, a.col3 FROM a /*+ tableOptions(partition_key='col2', partition_size='4') */ WHERE a.col2 IN (SELECT col1 FROM b /*+ tableOptions(partition_key='col1', partition_size='4') */ WHERE b.col3 > 0) ORDER BY 2 DESC
